definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: In the absence of epitaphs found, the owner's identity is not know.
sentences.chinese: 由于没有发现墓志，墓主的身份尚不得知。

sentences.english: The owner of our four clay cows would have been laid in an oval pit.
sentences.chinese: 我们这些小陶牛的墓主被长眠着一座椭圆型的土坑里。

sentences.english: Zheng Qiqiu, owner of the Tomb is not known on document, but his act can mend history.
sentences.chinese: 墓主郑齐丘，不见于文献，行事可补史。

definition: funerary objects (items buried together with the dead)
inscribed stone tablet placed in the tomb/memorial inscription on such a tablet
to dig up/to appear in an excavation/unearthed/to come up out of the ground
path leading to a grave/tomb passage/aisle leading to the coffin chamber of an ancient tomb
a pottery figurine buried with the dead
